name: OVER THE SPEED LIMIT
description:
You started to go over the speed limit but you are able to get pass cars but unless you crash because it will be fatal.

Creator's Note:

My first game that is not a tutorial Yay I'm learning.

Anyways feedback is appreciated to fix bugs and problems.(Yes I did play test the game and for some the UI for the game is nearer or not in the right place can someone tell me how to fix that.)
